name: Army Heli Gunship Battle
description:
Army Heli Gunship Battle is the most immersive and realistic 3D helicopter battle action game combines stunning 3D graphics with flight control simulation and engaging military scenarios to pull you into an immersive combat experience the moment you start the game. Strategically fire your powerful machines guns and devastating missiles to slay hordes of enemies across the world.

Game Features:
- Realistic 3D graphics and stunning visual effects
- Complex and challenging missions to enjoy the game
- Multiple war locations with a variety of weapons and equipment
- Multiple weapons to fire
- Heavy equipment and ammunition.
- Optimized controls to be able to play the best shooting game
- Amazing 3D environment
- Real sound effects
